He is currently trying to reach the Dark Continent.   ~!Beyond decides to ignore the prohibitions of the V5 about exploring the Dark continent and makes a speech with 10 important followers (with Pariston among them) saying that he is willing to see a land that nobody has ever seen. Meanwhile, the Zodiacs are given the special assignment to hunt him down, by the V5.!~

characters.name: Latarza
characters.description: Latarza is a Greed Island player who preys on new players. He wears a tanktop, baggy pants and a pair of headphones. His afro-textured hair is tied into a number of upright bunches on top of his head. When Killua has just entered the game, Latarza casts the spell card Trace on him then immediately flees to Masadora city using the Return spell card when he feels that the kid is dangerous. The tattoo on his right shoulder "雷" is the kanji for Thunder, while the one on his left shoulder "風" is the kanji for Wind.    ~!Latarza later is killed by Feitan and Phinks.!~

characters.name: Banana Kavaro
characters.description: Banana Kavaro is a member of the Kakin wildlife exploration team.

characters.name: Spinner Clow
characters.description: Spinner Clow, nicknamed "Spin (スピン)", is a young girl and an amateur beast hunter and member of the Kakin exploration team lead by Kite.

characters.name: Podungo Lapoy
characters.description: Podungo Lapoy is a member of the Kakin exploration team, under Kite's direction. She has dark skin with hair tied up in a topknot. She is the smallest member of the group. Kite has stated that Podungo and her fellow amateur Hunters in the Kakin Exploration Team have excellent potential to be pro-hunters.

characters.name: Lin Koshi
characters.description: Lin Koshi is a member of the exploration team who come to survey the country of Kakin with Kite. He is a short man with round glasses, and is usually seen nervous and stuttering. He has already discovered more than 1000 new species of animals even before meeting Gon and Killua. Kite has stated that Lin and his fellow amateur Hunters in the Kakin Exploration Team have excellent potential to be pro-hunters.

characters.name: Stick Dinner
characters.description: Stick Dinner is a man with an Afro hairstyle who comes to survey the country of Kakin with Kite. He is from the same town as Spinner. He likes saying puns and seems to be in charge of the group's rations. According to Kite, Stick Dinner and his fellow amateur Hunters in the Kakin Exploration Team have excellent potential to be pro-hunters. He is seen once again back in his hometown along with the rest of Kite's apprentices, Gon and Kite.

characters.name: Monta Yuras
characters.description: Monta Yuras, nicknamed "Mon," is a large man with a koala-like face who surveys the country of Kakin for new species with Kite. He seems to be in charge with the luggage. Kite has stated that he and his fellow amateur Hunters in the Kakin Exploration Team have excellent potential to be pro-hunters.

characters.name: Knov
characters.description: Knov is a Hunter who participated in the Chimera Ant Extermination Mission.

characters.name: Chimera Ant no Joou
characters.description: Gives birth to all the Chimera Ants seen in the story, including the Chimera Ant King Meruem.

characters.name: Colt
characters.description: Colt (コルト, Koruto) is a Chimera Ant squadron leader. His name from when he was human is Kurt.

characters.name: Zazan
characters.description: Zazan is a scorpion-like Chimera Ant Squadron Leader.

characters.name: Welfin
characters.description:
Welfin is a Chimera Ant that resembles a humanoid wolf and a former tactician. His name from when he was human is Zaikahal (ザイカハル Zaikaharu). After the death of the Chimera Ant King, Welfin travels to Meteor City in search of Gyro.

__Nen Type:__ Conjuration

## __Welfin's Abilities:__

~!__Missileman__ (卵男ミサイルマン Eggman)
_Type: Conjuration_
Welfin conjures an organic-looking missile launcher on his back with a shrunken head and four alien limbs, each holding a missile. The ability has 3 steps:
- Welfin establishes a target.
- The missile is loaded with a question or an order.
- If the target lies or defies the order, the attack begins.

If all the steps are executed correctly, the missiles continuously chase the target until they hit, even if Welfin himself can no longer sense the target. However, it is possible for the ability to misfire, which occurs when Welfin incorrectly identifies the target. Furthermore, the ability does not prevent the target from attacking Welfin except through deterrence, which means that if they are willing to be hit by the missiles, they will be able to strike first. The ability also has a long set-up and is difficult to use stealthily, since it requires a verbal exchange. These weaknesses led Welfin to look down on Missileman, prompting him to use it only in negotiations.

The missiles explode upon impact, implanting live Black Centipedes (黒クロ百足ムカデ, Kuro Mukade) in the target's head instead of dealing lethal damage. The centipedes grow by feeding on the target's defiance, inflicting excruciating pain until they kill the target. Should the target attempt to kill Welfin, the centipedes will instantly grow to fatal size, causing the death of the host and preventing them from carrying out their attack. Welfin himself is unable to remove the centipedes once they are inside the target. However, his feelings of defeat and sincerity harm the centipedes to the point that they can kill them, causing them to disappear. Welfin himself was originally unaware of this aspect of his ability.!~

characters.name: Kurt
characters.description: Kurt is Reina's older brother and a 9-year-old boy. He and Reina are the first two humans being devoured by the Queen. Kurt has a desire to protect his younger sister until she finds someone she loves more than him. This desire is so strong that it is passed on to Colt, his reincarnation as a Chimera ant, and has a great influence on Colt's mentality.

characters.name: Reina
characters.description: Reina is a five year old girl who, along with her nine year old brother Kurt, is one of the first human beings devoured by the Queen. She has a great psychological influence on Colt, who is Kurt's reincarnation. ~!It is later revealed that Reina has been reborn as Shidore, a Chimera ant who serves Hina. In the end she returns home to her village and is reunited with her mother.!~

characters.name: Rammot
characters.description: Rammot (ラモット, Ramotto) is a Chimera Ant and an officer in Colt's squad. He attacked Gon and Killua but was defeated by them, with Rammot eventually seeking revenge on the pair.

characters.name: Leol
characters.description: Leol (レオル, Reoru) was a Chimera Ant resembles an anthropomorphic lion. Before the death of the Chimera Ant Queen, he was known as Hagya (ハギャ, Hagya), and was one of the particularly disloyal squadron leaders. Leol's memories of his previous life are not that of a human's, but those of a lion. During Morel and Knov’s primary infiltration of the King's palace in East Gorteau, Leol faces Morel in combat. He assumes he is victorious after submerging Morel in an underground church using a stolen ability, but dies by asphyxiation due to a cunning strategy put into action by Morel.

characters.name: Balda
characters.description: Balda was in an expedition group in NGL along with Pokkle and Ponzu. They learn about the Chimera Ants, and plan to warn the outside world of the crisis at hand, however they are detected by Zazan's squad.

characters.name: Bloster
characters.description: Bloster is a lobster-based Chimera Ant and former Squadron Leader.

characters.name: Peggy
characters.description: Peggy is a Chimera Ant Officer resembling a macaroni penguin.

characters.name: Haruna
characters.description: Haruna is the benign single parent of Kurt and Reina who lives in a village in NGL. She is deeply saddened by the deaths of her son and daughter and grows weak and thin as a result.

characters.name: Koala
characters.description: Koala was a soldier under Meleoron's command, but disapproved of Meleoron's pacifist attitude. He generally does not take part in the war between the Hunters and Chimera Ants. After Meleoron has gone individual, he is presumably free from any duty.

characters.name: Hina
characters.description: __Species:__ Chimera Ant  __Rank:__ Squad Captain  __Squad:__ Hagya's Squad  Chimera ant with the appearance and personality of a young girl. Usually seen accompanying Leol and Flutter. Previously named "Hirin (ヒリン)".   ~!Hina is later revealed to be a nen exorcist; she is capable of removing curses or any other sort of inconveniences caused by another nen user. Hina's belly expands with the aura she has taken, causing her to appear almost pregnant. After using the ability, her movement is limited.!~

characters.name: Yunju
characters.description: Yunju's front half is that of a muscular man, while his behind is that of a horse. He has spiky blue hair, red eyes, and a serpentine tongue.

characters.name: Tserriednich Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: ツェリードニヒ＝ホイコーロ
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire, Heil-Ly Family
__Occupation:__ Fourth Prince of the Kakin Empire
~!__Nen:__ Specialist!~

Tserriednich Hui Guo Rou is the Fourth Prince of the Kakin Empire, and the son of his father's first wife, Unma. He is also a benefactor of the Heil-Ly Family, one of the three great Mafia families in Kakin's underworld.

~!Tserriednich's Guardian Spirit Beast resembles a horse with feminine feature with long fair hair, a long neck with a mane that can extend several meters, big four fingered hands, big sharp pointed nipples, a tail resembling a nine tailed whip, and it wears high heel shoes. The inside of the beasts mouth reveals another face within, with a split tongue and jagged teeth!~

characters.name: Camilla Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Second Prince of Kakin Empire

Camilla is a beautiful woman with long, fair hair worn in an intricate hairstyle, with some locks falling on her back, others being tied above the nape of her neck and four framing her face. She has clear eyes and long eyelashes.
In her first appearance, she is seen wearing a necked dress and a tiara. In general, she seems to wear fancy dresses. During the ceremony, Camilla wears a mermaid dress, and for the formal party, she wears a splendid long dress with sophisticated embroidery and two luxurious necklaces. Her hairstyle during the party is also different, resembling a large beehive style, though some of her locks are still falling around her face.

Camilla gave the untouchables of Kakin the chance to become her private guards. She had a special district built on her private property where they can enjoy privileges equal to those of the military, which earned her the support of the group

characters.name: Benjamin Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: ベンジャミン＝ホイコーロ
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ First Prince of the Kakin Empire, Deputy Military Adviser of the Royal Army

Benjamin is a large, heavily muscled man with spiky hair. He has a large nose and lines across his cheeks.

Benjamin is a very aggressive man, as seen when he easily becomes riled from his younger brother's taunting. He is also extremely self-confident, causing Tubeppa to view him as arrogant. Despite that, he is sociable as he is seen amiably talking with two elderly guests at the formal party. He treats his soldiers with respect and honors the memory of the deceased ones.
His ultimate goal is not only the throne of Kakin, but the unification of the world under Kakin rule. To achieve it, he has no qualms about killing his own siblings, which he in fact sees as a duty in order to maintain the "tree" of the royal family healthy. In particular, he seems to hate Tserriednich, while also having a sort of rivalry with him, and is determined to kill him with his own hands. Despite Tserriednich thinking lightly of Benjamin's intelligence, Balsamilco believes this to be a byproduct of his impulsiveness and tendency to take the shortest route to a goal but regards him as flexible and logical once he has been supplied the necessary information to act upon.

characters.name: Oito Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Eighth Queen of the Kakin Empire

Oito Hui Guo Rou (オイト＝ホイコーロ, Oito Hoikōro) is the Eighth Queen of the Kakin Empire and eighth wife of King Nasubi. She gave him his youngest daughter, Prince Woble.
Oito is a young woman in her late twenties or early thirties. She has an oval face and long dark hair she keeps behind her ears.

characters.name: Nasubi Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ King of the Kakin Empire

Nasubi Hui Guo Rou is the ruler of the Land of Kakin . He has 8 "legal" wives and 14 "legal" children, which he considers all princes.
Nasubi is an obese figure with narrow eyes and a top knot. He has long, curvy eyebrows, eyelashes and mustache. He wears traditional, ornamented clothing that is adorned with jewels, which emphasizes his status as a king.

characters.name: Bill
characters.description: Hunter assigned to the fourteenth prince of the Kakin Empire, Woble Hui Guo Rou and her mother, as a bodyguard. He is affiliated with Beyond Netero's Dark Continent Expedition Team.

characters.name: Halkenburg Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: ハルケンブルグ＝ホイコーロ
characters.description: Ninth Prince of the Kakin Empire and the son of his father's second wife, Duazul.

characters.name: Gyro
characters.description:
Gyro is the founder and the former king of NGL. As a human, he suffered an abusive childhood at the hands of his alcoholic father. His ambition is to spread evil throughout the world. 

~!He is reborn as a chimera ant. Due to his strong will and pride, he quickly regains his human memories and ignores the queen's order !~

characters.name: Morena Prudo
characters.description:
__Affiliation__: Heil-Ly Family Tserriednich Hui Guo Rou
__Occupation__: Boss of the Heil-Ly Family
__Abilities__: Contagion

 She is the Boss of Heil-Ly Family. She is an illegitimate daughter of Nasubi Hui Guo Rou and his mistress.
####__Personality__ :
~!As a result of being scarred and cast out, Morena developed a profoundly destructive behavior. She takes no interest in the succession contest, the world at large, or even her own life. Her only goal is to destroy a world she perceives as unjust and utterly disgusting, which she wishes to accomplish through indiscriminate carnage. Nonetheless, she is thankful for her scar, as she believes that without it, she would not have found her balance and will to live. She also expressed gratitude for her devoted followers, to whom she ordered to kill each other until 22 remained. She is always seen with a faint smile on her face and appears to make many pauses while speaking.!~

####__Background__ :
~!Morena was born to King Nasubi and his mistress. Due to not being an official child of his, she received two scars on her face as soon as she was born and she was allowed to live under the condition that she never appears in public or concern herself with politics. At some point after joining the Heil-Ly family, Morena, at the time a junior member, staged a coup and became the new Boss. She then had her underlings kill each other until only 22 remained.!~

characters.name: Luzurus Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: ルズールス゠ホイコーロ
characters.description: Luzurus Hui Guo Rou is the Seventh Prince of the Kakin Empire and the son of his father's second wife, Duazul. He is also in league with the Cha-R Family, one of the three great Mafia families of the Kakin Empire.

characters.name: Fugetsu Hui Guo Rou
characters.description: Fugetsu Hui Guo Rou is the Eleventh Prince of the Kakin Empire, and the daughter of her father's sixth wife, Seiko. She is the younger twin sister of Kacho.

characters.name: Zhang Lei Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: チョウライ゠ホイコーロ
characters.description: Zhang Lei Hui Guo Rou is the Third Prince of the Kakin Empire and the son of his father's third wife, Tang Zhao Li. He is currently in alliance with the Xi-Yu Family, one of the three great Mafia families in Kakin's underworld.

characters.name: Maha Zoldyck
characters.description: Maha Zoldyck is the oldest living member of the Zoldyck Family and Zeno's grandfather.

characters.name: Zigg Zoldyck
characters.description: Zigg Zoldyck is one of the two friends of Isaac Netero's who joined him in a past unrecorded expedition to the Dark Continent.

characters.name: Kacho Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
Kacho Hui Guo Rou was the Tenth Prince of the Kakin Empire and the daughter of her father's sixth wife, Seiko. She was the elder twin sister of Fugetsu.

(Source: Hunterpedia)

characters.name: Theta
characters.description:
Theta is one of the five known bodyguards working for Prince Tserriednich. She is one of the 20 members of staff journeying with him to the Dark Continent. On normal duty she reports directly to Tserriednich and can give orders to the other bodyguards.

(Source: Hunterpedia)

characters.name: Nanika
characters.description: Nanika (ナニカ, Nanika—lit. "Something") is a mysterious Dark Continent creature who came to possess Alluka Zoldyck under unknown circumstances. The two currently coexist inside Alluka's body.

characters.name: 86-ban
characters.description: A confident rock climber who got attacked and captured by monster birds while trying to descend trick tower along the outer wall during Hunter Exam's third phase.

characters.name: Lynch Fullbokko
characters.description: She is a member of the Xi-Yu Family

characters.name: Hinrigh Biganduffno
alt_names: ヒンリギ゠ビガンダフノ
characters.description: The Underboss of the Xi-Yu Family. His Nen ability can turn any device he touches into a living creature.

characters.name: Zakuro Custard
characters.description: A member of the Xi-Yu Family. Zakuro can manipulate their own blood at will.

characters.name: Pike
characters.description: A spider-like Chimera Ant Officer in [Zazan](https://anilist.co/character/83201/)'s squad.

characters.name: Babimyna
characters.description: Babimyna is a high-ranking soldier in the Royal Army of the Kakin Empire, and one of the personal soldiers of Prince Benjamin.

characters.name: Vergei
characters.description: He is the Captain of Queen Sevanti's Royal Guard. He has a crush on Biscuit Krueger.

characters.name: Tubeppa Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ 5th Prince of the Kakin Empire, Scientist

__Tubeppa Hui Guo Rou is the Fifth Prince of the Kakin Empire and the daughter of her father's second wife, Queen Duazul.__

Tubeppa has sharp, bowl-shaped fair hair, a long nose, a long thin mouth, and a squarish chin. She wears a pair of eyeglasses and earrings. Her features and build are masculine; she also chooses to wear a formal suit during the departure party, while her sisters are wearing dresses.

characters.name: Sheila
characters.description: __Sheila __is a woman originating from Meteor City, a junkyard city inhabited by outcasts. Sheila was a childhood friend of [__Chrollo__](https://anilist.co/character/58/Chrollo-Lucilfer) and all other members of the Phantom Troupe.

characters.name: Tyson Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Sixth Prince of the Kakin Empire

__Tyson __is a short, stout woman with a round face, and straight long black hair. She has dark, upturned eyes, long eyelashes, and she has an oval-shaped eyebrows. She often wears simple clothes with fuzzy, floral, or love-themed designs, accents, or patterns.

__Tyson __enjoys being surrounded by handsome men and selected her bodyguards using that criterion.She likes being pampered by her bodyguards, is very feminine, and enjoys flattery from them, blushing when they call her "cute".

characters.name: Momoze Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Twelfth Prince of the Kakin Empire

__Momoze__ projected the image of a calm and gentle girl, was a young girl with delicate features and long, lustrous hair worn in an elaborate ponytail, During the festival before Black Whale departure, __Momoze__ wore a refined long-sleeved A-line dress with a black shirt, and for the royal banquet, she was seen wearing a tiara and gown with juliet sleeves.

characters.name: Salé salé Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Eighth Prince of the Kakin Empire 

__Salé salé__was a tall, fat man with a plump face. His hair was fair, short at the sides of his head, and longer in the middle. He has ear piercings on his right ear. He had fairly large muscles, which together with his general corpulence contributed to his large appearance.

__Salé salé__was a womanizer and was often seen surrounded by attractive and scantily clad young women. he penchant for debauchery and gluttony were prominent throughout his appearances

characters.name: Woble Hui Guo Rou
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Fourteenth Prince of the Kakin Empire

Woble is the Fourteenth Prince of the Kakin Empire, and the daughter of her father's eighth wife, [Queen Oito ](https://anilist.co/character/130037/Oito-Hui-Guo-Rou). She is the youngest child among the 14 siblings.

characters.name: Longhi
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire, Tubeppa Hui Guo Rou
__Occupation:__ Royal Bodyguard for Prince [Tubeppa. ](https://anilist.co/character/346825/Tubeppa-Hui-Guo-Rou)

__Longhi__is has fair hair tied back in a long ponytail behind their back, and gaunt cheeks. As a Royal Bodyguard , she wears a black suit and a tie.

characters.name: Sarasa
characters.description:
__Sarasa __is a woman originating from Meteor City, a junkyard city inhabited by outcasts. Sarasa was a childhood friend of [__Chrollo__](https://anilist.co/character/58/Chrollo-Lucilfer) and all other members of the Phantom Troupe.

She was an extrovert, spunky, positive, and enthusiastic girl. She also had a mischievous, albeit good-natured side was also a kind-hearted and forgiving person.

characters.name: Marayam Hui Guo Rou
alt_names: マラヤーム＝ホイコーロ
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kakin Empire
__Occupation:__ Thirteenth Prince of the Kakin Empire

__Marayam__ the Thirteenth Prince of the Kakin Empire, youngest son among the 14 legal princes, and the younger of his father's seventh wife Queen Sevanti's two children. __Marayam__ had one older biological/full sister, 12th Prince Momoze

__Marayam__ appears to be fond of his pet hamster, and he carries it with him even to formal events. He also seems to enjoy video games. He appears to be reluctant to manifest negative feelings, while he is quite open about his joy while playing.

characters.name: Borksen
characters.description: Borksen is a private first class in the Royal Army of the Kakin Empire and a Provisional Hunter.
